entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
